channel.title: Lol need help badly
channel.description:
What does that hamachi thing mean? I downloaded it and I found post where is name and pass to hamachi. I putt them to hamachi and POOF there is a gray thing where is ip:s and names. I logged in with that pass and name and I putt that server ip but nothing happens. So what I need to do in hamachi?! :p
When I update things in notepad and save they dont appear in moparscape. Like I click npc.cfg>edit and I put there npc = 1 and hp 900 and I do that npc but it hp is still 0/0. Lol Im not good at this jobs and writing english but anyway
When I download project 1.6 and other server or what they are so when I start them there read
Using port 4357 I dont remember what port it was. But the server dont start. Why?
Btw I cant open doors and that and I dont know scripts to avoid that bug or whatever it is :p So can someone tell me these things fixing codes
Going castle wars Npcs hp - That was that npc.cfg thing ? Hitupdate fix - I found that but I dont know how to put that code lol :D more info for that pls Can open doors and like that updates
BTW I just download testscape and when I started it there comes a message in runningbot:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClass.Def FoundError: server
How I can fix that?
[glow=red,2,300][b]PLS HELP[/b][/glow]
